c74object.name: zsa.slope~
c74object.digest:
zsa.slope~
returns an estimation of the amount of spectral magnitude decreasing.
c74object.description:
the spectral magnitude decreasing is computed by linear regression on the magnitude spectra, returning the slope of the straight line. The object works in the spectral domain, so you need to use it whithin
pfft~
.

method.name: signal
method.description:
If both signal inlets are connected, left signal inlet expects real values and right inlet expects imaginary values. If the left inlet is the only signal connected input, the signal is interpreted as the energy (you need to calculate it using
cartopol~
or better
zsa.energy~
).

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description:
mode
allows to choose between calculating the linear regression on the magnitude spectra (mode = 0), or on the logarithm of it (mode = 1). Default value = 0.
